preview.description:
This website was created with permission from hobbyist creative writer and friend: Jeremy Cole. He shared with me a few examples of his work when we lived in the same apartment at the start of our college experiences several years ago and I thoroughly enjoyed reading them all!

Loving his writing style and stories so much, I asked and obtained permission to create a portoflio website displaying his works. Many of the stories displayed on the website are original works of his own along with a few selected works of fan-art; all of them worthy of reading.

This website was constructed using Boot Strap software. It is still in development due to lack of textual content and cover images, but additions and improvements will be made in the future.
